description:
Hikari tries to alleviate Futaba`s apprehensions about her new life in a way that she knows best. Futaba later has to "study" as her trial period in the Diving Club begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Story of the Secret to Excitement and Happiness
Wakuwaku to Shiawase no Kotsu no Koto
わくわくと幸せのコツのコト
